title: Autumn
marks: Signature, Title, and Date LLC, in pencil: [Autumn]; LLC, in image, in red: [
description: very abstract autumn: large, L-shaped block of tan and L-shaped block of pink colors at center; triangular shapes of color (red, green, white, red, orange, grey) at L; red and yellow stripes at LR; black stick-like tree at R; red sun at URC; two groups black diagonal lines cut across image, one near center, one near the bottom; other blocks of color throughout
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
